outputs.output_descr: The Office of the President is staffed with competent and motivated personnel; sufficiently resourced, equipped and operational to support the Presidency in the implementation of GoSS Policy and strategic priorities

The project provides institutional and technical support to the Office of the President, Government of Southern Sudan to oversee and monitor development and implementation of key development in Southern Sudan.  The project trains staff in the Office of the President to render efficient and effective service in delivering its mandate. It provides support to free and fair election based on international standards provided.

The Office of the President is staffed with competent and motivated personnel; sufficiently resourced, equipped and operational to support the Presidency in the implementation of GoSS Policy and strategic priorities

The project provides institutional and technical support to the Office of the President, Government of Southern Sudan to oversee and monitor development and implementation of key development in Southern Sudan.  The project trains staff in the Office of the President to render efficient and effective service in delivering its mandate. It provides support to free and fair election based on international standards provided.

project_descr: Build the capacity of the Office of the President of the Government of Southern Sudan to play a key role in supporting the President to provide strong leadership to the country, and contributing to democratic development and sustainable peace."
project_title: Support to Office of the President
